text: Did you know that #fasting can help correct metabolic diseases like #diabetes, strengthen the immune system, and reduce the risk of #cancer? Ian & March share their experience w/ a 5-day fast on the latest episode of @TheBetterShow.  Get on @ApplePodcasts https://t.co/TVOPPmEpMt https://t.co/mMpW3TABcD
